de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.churn
Interface ChurnGenerator

All Superinterfaces:
Composable, Configurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultChurnGenerator
public interface ChurnGenerator
extends Configurable, Composable

This component models the connectivity of peers within p2p systems which is also referred to as churn. Using a specific ChurnModel, it is possible to study its impact on the performance of a p2p system.

Version:
3.0, 12/03/2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune, Konstantin Pussep

Method Summary
 void setChurnModel(ChurnModel model)
          Sets a specific ChurnModel which will be used within a simulation run
 void setStart(long time)
          Sets the point in time at which the simulation framework will activate the churn behavior which has to be set using setChurnModel()-method.
 void setStop(long time)
          Sets the point in time at which the simulation framework will deactivate the churn behavior.
 
Methods inherited from interface de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.scenario.Composable
compose
 

Method Detail

setChurnModel

void setChurnModel(ChurnModel model)
Sets a specific ChurnModel which will be used within a simulation run

Parameters:
model - the specified churn model

setStart

void setStart(long time)
Sets the point in time at which the simulation framework will activate the churn behavior which has to be set using setChurnModel()-method.

Parameters:
time - start time at which peers will be affected by churn

setStop

void setStop(long time)
Sets the point in time at which the simulation framework will deactivate the churn behavior.

Parameters:
time - end time at which peers will not be no longer affected by churn
